title: Update
body: Ive recently got the new update and I get stuck at 33% and it scans files for ever and wont go up ive searched online for help but nothing is working! and I cant play so if someone helps that would make my day since ive spent money on LoL and cant play :(

replies.body:
dude its quite normal- this is a big patch and when patching it only starts aplying things at 33%

you may have to wait a bit but this is normal
Either try repairing man or uninstall and re install :)
Shit man, I'm not sure then, I'm not in Riot technical support ;p
haha all gd hopefully I get help soon ;) thx for ur hlp
try closing  then opening the client if the does't work try repairing the client
if repairing doesn't work i don't know what will
yea repaired many times and does nothing
Trust me... its better this way. you don't want this patch.
